评论详情: I did not buy these from Amazon rather got them at Goodwill. I've worn other barefoot shoes prior (including Xeros) and these have so much more comfort in the sole. With these I not only feel I'm helping my feet be naturally spaced within the shoe but also experience a nice cushioned shoe. I liked these so much I searched the internet to find them and was honestly shocked this is where I did and what the price tag was.
I have neuropathy and these shoes are awesome. Normally my feet hurt at the end of the day but not with these.
Very comfortable- love the wide toe!!
Come flattened. Tight to out on, plenty of room once on.

评论概述: 🏆These would be fantastic for FAT FEET -no joke❣️
评论详情: These shoes would be amazing for swollen pregnant feet, diabetic feet or ‘fat feet’ as they are roomy all around❣️❣️❣️ 👍👍 They look identical to the product picture 👍👍 Super wide 👍👍 Fabric is a breathable knit, that’s comfortable & gives like the N¡k€’s FREE RN FLYKNIT* fabric does❣️ 👍👍 Cushion in the sole is nice for walking but would not qualify as “barefoot”, AT ALL! These wouldn’t be suitable for “barefoot“ minimalist trail running (like V¡br@m’s) but these are thin yet comfy enough to be a good option for 🏋️ lifting in. 👍👍 Heel has a loop to pull up on when putting on these shoes or to carabiner hook to a backpack when hiking/drying/etc. 👉 FYI they have minimal arch support 👎 These are made for feet that are wide all around, as stated above. The average minimalist shoe consumer is generally just looking for a wider toe box, flexibility in the sole of the shoe, NOT a shoe that has tons of fabric in the middle for very swollen or fat feet. When tightened and tied, the (extra) fabric in the middle of these shoes bunches up A LOT!  *I love my FLYKNIT N¡k€’s but they are a slender, shoe with too small of a toe box so I was hoping that these would be wider knit option.

I guess it's how you define a walking shoe. These might be suitable for clean sidewalks, but I felt every bit of gravel on my neighborhood streets. Didn't even enjoy wearing them indoors. These shoes are wide toed, but not high toed - felt pressure on my big toe from above. Bit of an update: gave the shoes to a friend. She said she's only had them off to go to bed since she received them. She loves them.
I wore them for a week and gave so much foot pain.

评论概述: My feet no longer hurt at the end of the day
评论详情: I love these shoes. I've never used naturalist shoes before but now I don't think I'll go back to regular shoes. It is so nice not having my feet shoved into narrow shoes and my neuroma between my third and fourth toe no longer hurts at all after wearing these. The heel could use a little more padding, but once I broke the shoes in I haven't noticed that as much. I also love that they're stretchy enough that I can leave them tied and just pull them on and off. They're breathable, comfortable, and sporty. I bought a size 7 and that's my typical shoe size. My toes sometimes hit the end while walking, though it's just barely and because my toes aren't being squished together it doesn't bother me, but consider buying 1/2 a size up when you buy them.
Not as flexible as I thought they’d be but has a nice sole for wet pavement and keeping my feet dry still. So far they’ve held up well and I enjoy the color.

评论概述: Only shoe that I can wear with my neuropathy 💕
评论详情: The wide toe box is fantastic. I have foot neuropathy and have had a very difficult journey finding a shoe that I can wear.  This shoe is great.
Super comfy, wide toe box. I wear a 6.5 and had to size down to a 6.
The shoes are poor quality large to size 7.5 more like 8.5 shoes where flattenedand mis- shaped
Toe box was comfortable, unfortunately my high arches made it very difficult to get the shoes on. Because of this I had to return them.
I have wide feet creating a situation for hammertoe in other shoes. These shoes are shaped wonderfully and don’t affect the toe growth. No more hammertoe
The shoe fit good a bit snug but good. I wore them 3 times and now there is a hole in the sole of the shoe. It seems very thin where the hole is. Won't buy again.

Nice looking shoes.  Unfortunately if you have problematic feet, these may not work. I was looking for a wide toebox, was searching under "diabetic shoes." These look nice and were reasonably priced. However, they are made like a slip on, with a knit collar and no tongue. I wear hard orthotics and a brace on one foot, and these were very hard to put one.  They do not open up to aid problem feet.  Once on, they were comfortable and wide toebox was great, but they took me a quite bit to put on.  Watch carefully if you need easy access shoes. They should not come up under diabetic shoes, especially for swollen, delicate feet.

评论概述: Price was good, but not made in USA
评论详情: Prompt delivery;  wide toe box shoe as indicated; true to size;  would like company to make in USA!!!
They feel durable, super lightweight, nice style, feel of basic tennis shoe warmth, can’t wait to test their durability and functionality soon.

评论概述: The area to slide your foot in is too small, NO TONGUE to help slide foot in.
评论详情: I can’t get the shoes on my feet because there is no tongue and the opening is way too small.Not made for  American adult feet. It’s a size 11 shoe with a 9 inch circumference opening. I just can’t stuff my feet in them, it’s a shame.

Summer weight with fairly thin bottoms, but they feel good for natural foot health and especially toe spread. They wash nicely by hand, i do not have the habit of machine washing shoes because i want the inside dirt massaged out with a brush.
Not only are these shoes quite lovely, but they are remarkably comfortable.  Purchased for work (office) and really pleased with what I have received.  Quality and priced reasonably.

The shoe are comfee, but not for women who ankle and feet swell. I purchased a 10W. I had to cut the sides a little. I plan on ordering the 11W to see if that works over all nice shoe a lot of toe room and light.

My daughter purchased these for me.  I’ve had feet problems since birth.  I had terrible bunions and always had to bring more than one pair a shoes a day to change into.  These have broke the cycle and provided soft comfortable fit.  I’m purchasing my second pair today!
I bought these shoes for my client I was Person Training and she loves them. They fit perfectly.
I’m returning and purchasing a size lower than what I typically wear. Otherwise they looked super cute! If it will let me change my rating once I get the smaller size then I’ll update it.

Getting older & having worked in the service industry most of my life means my whole body aches and I just can't do converse anymore. I got these & they are a total game changer. I cannot tell you how much I love these shoes. The wide toe box makes walking more comfortable and the design must make everything more stable cause even my hips hurt less. I bought the gray pair first & then went back and bought the black and maroon too. I personally really like the brown sole too. I love these shoes! Can't recommend them enough,  and they're super cute too! I get lots of compliments on them!
I’ve bought my mother two different colors, and she says they are super comfortable and beautiful.
After only a few weeks, the top shoelace hole/loop ripped.  I can't lace my left shoe all the way up now.

评论概述: Lots of Room in the Toebox!
评论详情: I have super wide feet and these shoes fit perfectly for my wide feet.  They are snug around the ankle so my foot doesn't slip out of them when I walk.  I like the stretchy fabric that "gives" when I'm walking without slipping out of the shoe. There was plenty of room for me to put my inserts into these shoes.  The soles are thick and kind of "clunky" sounding on wooden floors, but overall, they're a great fit!

评论概述: Super Wide, Can feel EVERYTHING You walk on
评论详情: Great to slip on and off. Very wide toe box. Love the color.  You can feel EVERYTHING you walk on. Climbed a rope pyramid at the park - felt the rope. Walking on gravel, you feel each piece of gravel - and it hurts.  Played in-door volleyball for 2 hours while wearing them - when trying to tighten them I broke a shoelace hole. Additionally my feet hurt that night and the next day.
I have plantar fasciitis, but I can wear these shoes all day without pain. I stand most of the day, so I appreciate the wide toe box. Excellent purchase!

I needed a big, roomy toe box for bunions and these work for that. But I have large ankles and these shoe comes up too close to the front of my ankle and that made them look like clown shoes on me. Probably fine for others but not big girls with big ankles. They are lightweight and I’m sure comfortable but not for me. I gave them away.

Very comfortable, a bit too wide for me, but during the cold months with thicker socks they’re perfect.  Bought an 8 and it fits (length) as it should.  Wore them out Saturday during errands and after a full day of walking feet felt great and no shin splint's.  So far, they wipe clean but I would imagine washing will be the real test. I’m pleasantly surprised at how much I like them.
Feels great and gives stability, especially in the toes
Comfortable good quality fit as expected, lightweight

These shoes are perfect! I’ve always had really wide feet and finding comfortable shoes has been a challenge. These shoes look great and give me lots of space in the toe. Pros: Wide Wide toe Cute footprint in snow Adorable  Cons: Short laces Not much arch support  I would absolutely buy these again!

These shoes arrived exactly as pictured. Sizing was accurate with their size chart. They were immediately comfortable- there was no break in period. I have pretty skinny feet. & was just looking for the wide toe box but these fit snug and stretch so my feet don’t slide around inside. My only ‘complaint’ is that I believe they were made to be worn without socks. I’d prefer to wear socks but these have been pulling my socks down and inside the shoes. I plan to just try wearing a taller style of socks with them. Great product for this price point.

These shoes are comfortable except for the opening around the ankle area. It’s tall and small so it rubs uncomfortably when I walk.  It’s better with socks. I didn’t really plan to wear socks with them, but I will.
These shoes are supposed to be extra wide with a roomy toe box. But they are narrow. I could not even get them on my feet.

I’m very particular about shoes and took a giant leap to buy online. Got these and put them on immediately and have been my go to shoes sense. Size was correct, width is so nice for my wide feet, and so much cushion on the bottom but also in the back of my ankle. I highly recommend these!

评论用户: Very comfortable and lightweight.  Easy to put on even if you have some mobility issues.  Will be great for running errands and physical therapy .  Very bright white on white...exactly what I wanted.  Fits perfectly for me and I have a high arch.  Could not be happier especially for the price.
评论详情: I have neuropathy and essential tremor syndrome.  I have been wearing barefoot shoes from another brand exclusive for 6 months.  They are a miracle for me because they allow me to feel the contact of the surface when walking.  It helps my confidence in walking with each step.  This pair give me an addional style to wear.  I love immaculate white tennis shoes especially with jeans.  I'm happy to add this style to the rotation.  I have always been a really barefoot girl...these shoes allow that same feeling and improve my gait.  The affordability is appreciated.  The cushioning in the heel is an added bonus.

I bought these shoes under the impression they were brand new. They are used! Stains on the top. Walking creases And a hair in the inside of the shoe.  The shoe is very comfortable and nicely made. I reordered. Hopefully I get a new pair. Said nothing about being used. I particularly don’t like used shoes.
These are made for wide feet, but not wide ankles. They have no tongue so the foot opening is too narrow for most
Because of the sock top design It was way to hard to put even one shoe on.This same problem  happened once before with another brand of shoes.Oh well another donation to the shoe drop off box.

I’ve worn barefoot shoes for many years and these are comfy out of the bag. I did take the extra insert out because I don’t need the extra cushion. My only complaint is the right shoe tip is a bit deformed from the way it was packaged.

Went up a half size so I could wear a bit thicker sock now that the weather is cooler. I have wide feet and I'm flat footed and have never owned shoes that didn't hurt my feet in one way or another after wearing a couple of hours.  Wearing these to work every day for 2 weeks and they're comfortable, don't squish my poor toes together and not ugly. How long will they last? No idea, but my feet don't ache and my toes are not screaming so I'm ordering another pair. Now!

They fit great and I love the wide toe box. Pretty comfy too.
Yay! I can stretch my toes in this shoe. Why have I not know about wide box toe shoes. Thank you!
I absolutely love the comfort of these while not having to be barefoot in the gym!
Fits true to size, durable and comfortable.  A great value for the price.
I didn't like them. Even tho I have a wide foot these was way to wide. And wasn't that comfortable

评论概述: Roomy for my toes!!  So comfortable!!!
评论详情: Wonderful, extremely comfortable shoes!!!

I really like these. And let me tell you they are the most breathable shoes, so breathable in fact that they make my feel so freaking cold. I have raynauds and wow my feet freeze in these. I got them in the fall so I realized will have to save them for summer use only.  My 12 year old son is embarrassed by them and thinks they make me look like a duck 🤷🏻‍♀️. Oh well, I think they’re cute and they are def wide toe & barefoot approved!
I needed a pair of shoes wide at the toes and these are fine
There were a little snug on the ankle but after a few wears they’ve broken in well and I really like them! Fit was perfect and I feel like my feet can really breathe!
I really love these shoes.

评论概述: These wide toed shoes are comfortable
评论详情: I bought them to help with the  burning In my feet because of neuropathy and they do give me some relief

Love these shoes. I don't know how long they will last but while they do I'm loving them. They are soft around the foot and feel great. I've walked at least 1 mile in them at one time without issue but I am used to walking in zero drop shoes. I was looking for a daily alternative to spare my more expensive Altra shoes and these fit the bill - I bought 2 more pairs!

评论概述: Clown shoes - must actually have wide feet for these to work.
评论详情: I don't have wide feet but have a capsulitis issue in one foot and my podiatrist recommended trying a wide shoe with a wide toe box. Lots of online searches later, I found this shoe. Unless you actually have wide feet, these shoes may not work for you. I agree with others about the padding, particularly in the heal area - it is quite substantial. But they fit like flippers and the front part of my foot just slides around in there. I normally wear and ordered a size 9. I have at least an inch of space from my big toe to the end of the shoe. It's almost comical how big they are - they are like clown shoes. Giving 3 stars because these may work for others, but beware of their sizing.

评论概述: Cool design and fit, needs more support
评论详情: My expectations were low when these went on sale for $23, and lower when they showed up wrapped in plastic instead of in a shoebox. But these are feet-shaped! If you are not a 10,000-steps-a-day person, they're probably awesome.  There was no break-in period for me, no chafing or blisters, no bunion pain. I put them on and it was like having custom-made shoes.. They're snug in the right way and my toes aren't squished.  The only drawback is there isn't a lot of padding/support. So these are my shoes for cute colors and comfort, and others for when I'm more active. But now my dilemma is do I buy 3 more pairs in different colors or spring for the brand name shoes and hope for more padding?
These are awful!  The shoe is sewn crooked and they are much wider than my black pair.

评论概述: Cute, and comfortable but don’t last
评论详情: I wore them for less than 6 months before the inner lining started falling apart and the sole showed through on the inside of the heel. Cute, but not built to last
I love these shoes! They have a wide toe box. They are cute, I get compliments ever time I wear them. Very comfortable. They only thing I would change would be a little arch support.
I have bunions and these shoes are so comfortable I forget I have them on. Well made.
These were comfy once on but the laces are just for show. They are more like a sock and very hard to put on.

This is my second pair. I wear them almost everyday to work. I like the style of these. They are lightweight and have a little cushioning. The wide toe box is wonderful. I have wide feet and an high arch. I can wear these all day with no problem. There is no arch support. You can feel gravel/rocks when you are walking. I wouldn’t hike in them. They are easy to clean. I also have the grey with gum sole. They have held up nicely.
Not enough support for my foot!

These were decently comfortable HOWEVER they are not anti-slip in any capacity. They have little traction at all and sent me sliding on a tile floor their first day of use. Once that happened I immediately changed into my spare shoes.  Do not buy if the anti-slip feature is a huge draw for you as I could have been seriously injured had I fallen in the scenario I was in.
I was looking forward to these shoes, but they were WAY too big for the labeled size.  Quality seems to be good though.
